title: Сделка?!
overview: "Deal?!" is not only a gambling and surefire game - the player will not return home empty-handed in any case. But also a bright, spectacular, truly exciting show. The growing suspense, the maximum intensity of passions are akin to the emotions of sports fans! TV viewers are involved in the gameplay, from which they can no longer tear themselves away. Not only playing, but also watching the game is an unforgettable pleasure!The project has gained extraordinary popularity not only in its homeland in the UK, but has also won the hearts of millions of TV viewers around the world. The program is watched in 37 countries, including the Middle East and South America. And everywhere this show shows consistently high ratings. "Deal?!" is a licensed format adapted by the REN TV channel together with the ENDEMOL company (Russia) for Russian TV viewers.
